snippet: William Morris Endeavor is said to have won the bidding war for IMG. | Bitcoin prices tumble after China’s biggest Bitcoin exchange was required to stop accepting deposits. | AMC Entertainment priced its initial public offering at $18 a share. |...
abstract: William Morris Endeavor is said to have won the bidding war for IMG. | Bitcoin prices tumble after China’s biggest Bitcoin exchange was required to stop accepting deposits. | AMC Entertainment priced its initial public offering at $18 a share. | George L. Shinn, a former chief executive of First Boston, dies.

byline.original: By CHAD BRAY and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Talent Agency Deal to Reshape Hollywood Landscape
